name: The Deckoning
description: Lord Tssba has awoken and  in tends wreak havoc unto the world. It is up to brave hero  and his cards to stop him. After facing a mere illusion of the dark lord, IT was inadvertently revealed that in order to stop him the hero would need to gather 4 powerful card from corners of the land. The hero takes his deck of cards and goes to gather these cards in order to stop the Dark Lord Tssba.
